1. Please ensure that the power cable plugged in.
2. Reset the camera: Please use thimbles light plug the camera back [Reset] hole, press and hold 1 second after loose. (Ejector pins in the box).
3. Wait for the led turns red and blue flashing, cameras can be added again.
4. Other questions, you can contact us by the following ways：
